Here is your Chelsea morning digest on Sunday, April 2.
Potter tipped for the sack

articles.author: Apratim Banerjee
articles.title: "I am the best player in the history of football" - Cristiano Ronaldo makes emphatic claim to Saudi media - Sportskeeda
articles.description: Al-Nassr superstar Cristiano Ronaldo recently claimed that he is the best player in football history. Ronaldo, hands down, is one of the best players to ever grace the beautiful game.

articles.title: Twin centuries earn Jersey's maiden ODI win; UAE keep qualification hopes alive | Cricbuzz.com - Cricbuzz - Cricbuzz
articles.description: Josh Lawrenson and Asa Tribe, the two centurions, put on a record 231 for the third wicket
